1.content: Welcome to Dragon Hunt, I see that your a new one to the contest little fella" the host says "Before you can go out and hunt, we need to take care of a few things. First, what are you?"
1.title: The Hunt Begins

11.content: "Ah your a green skin who devour his own kin to survive. Welcome again but you and i are nit done yet. last question, what is your gender
11.title: Orc

111.content:
"ok now we got that out of the way here is what you will need," the host says as he shoves items into your arms.
"the clear orbs are capture cases where you only have to throw it to capture a dragon" he says as he throws one at a Dragonkin who is entangled by glass tendrils before returning to the original orb size with the Dragonkin inside. "to release, you only have to drop it and the captive is releases" he says as you watch the orb release its prisoner. "the collars are so you can keep any dragon you like. now off you go" the host says as he goes to help another hunter leaving you on your own.

you travel half a mile away from the camp before stopping to organize your bag. as you clean your bag, you feel like your not alone and turn around to see what.
111.title: male

1111.content:
I am going to catch you

understood As he rolls you an orb

you grab it and throw it at Kyverna. the orb opens and begin to wrap and bind him before returning to its small size. you walk over to where Kyverna was and picked up a purple orb. you as you hold Kyverna's orb thinking on what to do
1111.title: catch him

11111.content:
you crack the orb and you watch as Kyverna returns from the glass prison

Orc, you release me why

i like you and dont want to sell you.

ahhh Kyverna says as he leans his head in and licks your chest

i also want you to...to... your voice trials off

what?

to eat me

a long silence ensues for before he leans in and whispers it will be my pleasure and how will my snack and friend like to be eaten
11111.title: keep him

12.content: Ok you are a Gnoll or a humanoid hyenna" the hose says "and I also can see that you are wearing a vest and jockstrap, but I have to ask what is your gender
12.title: Gnoll

13.content: Welcome, gargoyle and before we proceed, what color are your scales?
13.title: Gargoyle

131.content: excellent, now what is your gender?
131.title: red

1311.content:
To recap, you are a male gargoyle with red scales, white hair, and a leather body suit?" the host says "great now here are tour capture nets, Hypno collars, and id tags. Go out and gather as many dragons you want.

You left the camp about thirty minutes ago, and you have seen a lot of things. A latex-producing, carnivorous plant, wyverns swallowing smaller dragons, dragon vore traps, and more. You set up camp for the night when you felt a warm tongue slide up your back. You turn to see a...
1311.title: male

15.content: You're none of those than what are you?
15.title: other

151.content:
human aah so many are human its a shame, well anyways i look forward to seeing some large dragons slipping into your throat
or what ever other areas you'll pack them away in but first whats your gender.
151.title: Human

info.description:
this is a vore adventure so anyone under 18 should turn back and come back when they are of age. to the rest welcome. you get to hunt, capture, and humiliate the most fearsome and honorable creature, the dragon. all the characters will be color coated so watch out for the color shift with the different drags.

Your an explorer who stumbled onto a fearsome dragon who aims to make you its dinner. you have to work to bring yourself out of the way out of bring dinner by any means necessary. If successful you can hunt other dragon and add them to your collection and have them do anything you ask of them


Anyone can add any dragon they want, though word of warning. the first encounter is a safe vore environment, except if the dragon eats the character, so no digesting, dismemberment, etc. are allowed though after capture everything is fair game. so without a further ado, let the hunt begin
